entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `System.InsufficientExecutionStackException` on `linux-musl-s390x` #64423
  • CodeLens reports method references for unselected targets #64422
  • Getting CS8168 and CS8350 in .NET 7 RC1 for code that compiled on .NET 7 preview 7 and .NET 6 #64421
  • extract interface (vb) does not handle commented code correctly #64419

Closed

  • API proposal: represent `ref` fields and `scoped` parameters and locals #61647
    17.4
  • Update `SymbolDisplay` to include `scoped` for parameters and locals #63208
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Add symbol key tests #64420
    Area-IDE
  • Change wording so to pass Accessibility Insights #64418
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update SymbolDisplay API to include scoped for parameters and locals #64285
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64417
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64416
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64415
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64429
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64428
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64427
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #64426
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #64425
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64424
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE
  • Add tests to verify bug is fixed #64408
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Use save all, instead trying to get dirty indicator #64403
    Area-IDE
  • Handle assert found during IDE LSIF testing #64413
    Area-Compilers
